title: Manager, Solutions Consulting
content:
We’re looking for a leader who is passionate about solving customers’ challenges, delivering successful strategies to drive customer value and helping Asana achieve its Revenue goals. You will be responsible for leading a team of Solutions Consultants who are obsessed with proving the value of Asana and represent the voice of the customer internally.  With a focus on driving results, you lean towards building strategies and decisions built on data and intuition.  
You must be a hands-on leader who enjoys leading from the front and getting into details while also being able to think and act strategically.  A core priority is to be a great leader for your team and business partners, acting as a mentor and a coach who can guide team members through challenging and ambiguous situations. You'll do this all while keeping pace with rapid organizational growth and in coordination with global teams.
This role is based in our Dublin office with an office-centric hybrid schedule. Along with most Asanas, you’ll work from this office in person on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays. Most Asanas have the option to work from home on Wednesdays and Fridays. If you're interviewing for this role, your Talent Acquisition Partner will share more about the in-office requirements. 
What you’ll achieve

Develop and coach a team of high-performing solutions professionals recognised as technical and business experts
Design, develop, and deliver strategies to maximize our sales efficiency through solution and value selling
Identify and develop solution-oriented narratives and product demonstrations that generate the most return
Work with marketing, business, and product teams to find efficient paths to successful customers
Influence the lifecycle of the customer journeys from lead to close, owning the technical, solution and value sale 
Contribute to the business strategy in addition to influencing the vision of the product representing the voice of the customer 

About you

8 years of combined experience in a similar customer-facing and people management role preferably in B2B SaaS
Experience in:

Leading a team that is part of a global, matrixed organization
Building and managing teams that represent product and category expertise to unblock deals and move towards close
Explore the art of the possible with prospects and demonstrate the path to get there
Partnering effectively with sales managers to define the GTM strategy 
Partnering effectively with sales professionals to drive account strategy for top accounts 
Building teams that can drive contribution to revenue growth and retention through solution and value selling
Understands and has built presales motions and programs

Remains close to the cross-functional teams to streamline every part of the customer journey
Dedicated people manager who gets satisfaction from developing team members at different stages of their careers
Leads with a bias towards action and the ability to build and make the business case for scaling our business
Experience in navigating cross-functional relationships to get buy-in in a high-growth SaaS environment
Solution and Value focused -- a passion for understanding and solving pain points to bring the most value to customers

Our comprehensive compensation package plays a big part in how we recognize you for the impact you have on our path to achieving our mission. We believe that compensation should be reflective of the value you create relative to the market value of your role. To ensure pay is fair and not impacted by biases, we're committed to looking at market value which is why we check ourselves and conduct a yearly pay equity audit. 
For this role, the estimated base salary range is between €97,000 - €144,000. The actual base salary will vary based on various factors, including market and individual qualifications objectively assessed during the interview process. The listed range above is a guideline, and the base salary range for this role may be modified.
In addition to base salary, your compensation package may include additional components such as equity, sales incentive pay (for most sales roles), and benefits. If you're interviewing for this role, speak with your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about the total compensation and benefits for this role.
We strive to provide equitable and competitive benefits packages that support our employees worldwide and include:

Mental health, wellness & fitness benefits
Career coaching & support
Inclusive family building benefits
Long-term savings or retirement plans
In-office culinary options to cater to your dietary preferences 

These are just some of the benefits we offer, and benefits may vary based on role, country, and local regulations. If you're interviewing for this role, speak with your Talent Acquisition Partner to learn more about the total compensation and benefits for this role.
About us
Asana helps teams orchestrate their work, from small projects to strategic initiatives. Millions of teams around the world rely on Asana to achieve their most important goals, faster. Asana has been named a Top 10 Best Workplace for 5 years in a row, is Fortune's #1 Best Workplace in the Bay Area, and one of Glassdoor’s and Inc.’s Best Places to Work. After spending more than a year physically distanced, Team Asana is safely and mindfully returning to in-person collaboration, incorporating flexibility that adds hybrid elements to our office-centric culture. With 11+ offices all over the world, we are always looking for individuals who care about building technology that drives positive change in the world and a culture where everyone feels that they belong. 
We believe in supporting people to do their best work and thrive, and building a diverse, equitable, and inclusive company is core to our mission. Our goal is to ensure that Asana upholds an inclusive environment where all people feel that they are equally respected and valued, whether they are applying for an open position or working at the company. We provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by law.
#LI-NE1
